name: Cargo recollection
description:
You were contracted to gather as much cargo as you can from this wormhole in a non-descript part of the galaxy, just be careful to avoid the bombs. (game ends when one hits you)

(This is a small workshop project we did in class)

Controls:

Left arrow key - Move left (from bottom of circle)

Right arrow key - Move right (from bottom of circle)

Music courtesy of Frosti Hlífar Ragnarsson

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/BoredomMakesMusic

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/frostihlifar
